description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

Apworld-v0.1.0.description:
It's here! The first release I feel confident in calling a proper release. The logic is stable and many tests have been done by the community to help ensure it's safety.

Not much has changed since the last update, but some improvements have been made.

Updates:
- The goal now appears in UT when logically relevant.
- Currency and Exp multipliers have been added to the list of options.
- The Progressive Elite Gym Badges have been replaced with individual badges for each elite four member.
- The Kanto Elite Champion Badge is pre-placed on the Champion Blue fight.
- More filler items have been added to the pool. (Three of each Kanto currency)
- The numbers have been removed from pokemon items and locations, and locations are now named "Capture <Pokemon>"

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/AP-Pokeclicker/compare/0.6.Beta...Apworld-v0.1.0
Apworld-v0.1.0.title: AP Pokeclicker Apworld v0.1.0

Apworld-v0.1.1.description:
Fixed a bug preventing hosting the server on archipelago.gg.

--------------------

This release brings Alt Pokémon to the apworld.  All Kanto Alt forms and any settings I could think of related to them have been implemented.

Updates include:
- Dexsanity Shuffle mode
- Badge Randomization
- Alt Pokémon added as locations and items
- New Island dungeon location added
- Seasonal events are optional
- Redeemable codes added as items in the pool
- Rocky Helmet and Shiny code are added to damage calculation logic
- Various other bug fixes and logic improvements


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/AP-Pokeclicker/compare/Apworld-v0.1.0...Apworld-v0.1.1
Apworld-v0.1.1.title: AP Pokeclicker Apworld v0.1.1 Hotfix
